title: cultural_data_CARMONA_CITY_MUSEUM
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.museodelaciudaddecarmona.
Application Name: CARMONA CITY MUSEUM.
Number of Reviews: 7.00.
Application Description: The multimedia guide of the Carmona City Museum (Seville, Spain). The best way to tour, enjoy and learn the experience of the Museum anywhere, accompanying the visitor and approaching the collection to all interested public. The Carmona City Museum reveals us the history of Carmona from the Prehistory to the present day thanks to the archaeological remains that offer its visit. All this framed in an environment like the one offered by the Marqués de las Torres Mansion, whose origins date back to the 16th century.Read moreCollapse.
